name: Saving Grace (Thomas09 Games)
description:
If you encounter a game-breaking bug. press BACKSPACE to restart the level!

What would it be like if some masked men took your daughter? What would you do?

How would you do it? would you meet their demands? or suffer the loss. The choice is yours. 

Undertake this journey to get your daughter back... if its not already too late.

Can YOU find the secret RPG in the boss fight?

This is a "Pilot". Please let me know what you would like to see next in Saving Grace. I am more than happy to continuing the developement to make this game even longer and better! Please Leave comments and reviews!

This game was not free to make, and it will only get more expensive. If you enjoyed the game please support me by donating! I want to make this into something amazing!

Do you want to see more? Let me know what else you'd like to see in Saving Grace!
